DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : ECONOMY
DOC.TEXT: Venezuela ' s Planning Minister Quits : The official in_charge of long-term economic planning quit because of disputes with the government on how to rally Venezuela ' s foundering economy . Planning Minister Luis Carlos Palacios said he disagreed_with government plans announced last week to impose price and exchange controls . He also said the government had ignored a broad economic plan put_forward by his ministry that included increasing the prices for fuel , modifications to the social_security system and intensified talks with the International Monetary Fund .
